timeline.message:
Update code to Firebase Crashlytics SDK

- LEARNER-7749
- Migrate to Firebase Crashlytics SDK.
- Remove Fabric Answer Analytics.
- Update firebase-messaging lib to v20.2.0 in support of Firebase Crashlytics.
- Resolve firebase library conflicts.
- Update Test cases related after removing the fabric configs

Ref: https://firebase.google.com/docs/crashlytics/upgrade-sdk?platform=android

timeline.bodyText: Please remove KITS, CRASHLYTICS, ANSWER as well
timeline.author: omerhabib26

replies.bodyText: Plus If you can also remove these keys as well PARSE, PARSE_ENABLED, PARSE_APPLICATION_ID, PARSE_CLIENT_KEY
replies.author: omerhabib26

commits_in_main.message: feat: Implement The Latest Version of Discover Experience - Remove old configurations parsing and it's usage - Implement new Discovery configurations and update Config.java accordingly - Optimize + Remove unused code - Updated test cases. fix: LEARNER-8852
